page.title: 05Industry
page.content: In our block there is part of Kirkby Industrial estate. In this part of the estate there are over 100 companies whose business is extremely varied . There are some well known ones such as Birds Eye and Kraft Food Ltd, both of which are concerned with food.Others are responsible for such things as the hire of heavy machines , precision tool-making, chemicals and importing timbers. Even so there is still a lot of unemployment in Kirkby and companies are closing all the time. Also in the block there is a recording studio that has made records for some famous "pop" groups such as China Crisis . The company is called Amazon Recording Studio.
